item.title: [SPR-2259] ActiveMQ 4.0.1 & SF 2.0RC2 throw: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: ClassLoader must not be null
item.description:

Lastly i upgraded my system to SF 2.0RC2 and experience java.lang.IllegalArgumentException when my application is staring on Tomcat 5.5.17.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I updated the code for DNHR.init but it needs to be tested.

DNHR now uses thread context class loader if no classloader is supplied explicitly.

This will I believe solve your issue.
